column1:
Weight loss obtained through a low-calorie diet and regular physical activity result in a small 
improvement in testosterone levels.
Testosterone gels and long-acting injectable TU represent T preparations with the best safety profile.
Gonadotropins treatment can be used to restore fertility in men with secondary hypogonadism.
